programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.

programme.title: The Valley
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash in the middle of Lebanon’s isolated Beqaa Valley, an amnesiac man finds himself held hostage on a local farm that doubles as an illegal drug-production facility.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: For A Moment, Forever
programme.desc: A young popstar overwhelmed by fame meets a troubled ex-rocker teaching music to adolescents at a therapy centre. Both longing for love, they get closer as affection for music connects them, but shall they overcome the burdens of his past?

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schäfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Victim
programme.desc: Ukrainian immigrant Irina lives with her son Igor in a small Czech border town. When she discovers that Igor has been assaulted by three Romas her whole world comes crashing down. As times goes on, Irina begins to spot inconsistencies in his story.

programme.title: Let's Celebrate 2025 - Part Two
programme.desc: Kick off the New Year in style with Let’s Celebrate 2025, your countdown party by Mediacorp and the Singapore Sports Hub! With the theme `Let the Music Play’, we’ve jam-packed the line-up with top talents like Taufik Batisah, Shigga Shay, Regina Song, Tasha Low, Tosh Rock, Iman Fandi, and many more! The stroke of midnight signals a pulsating finale with a spectacular 15 minutes of fireworks, the longest single display islandwide. Join hosts Joakim Gomez and Munah Bagharib in ringing in 2025 and Singapore’s 60th year of nationhood!

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: Murders In Brouage
programme.desc: A young majorette is found murdered near the property of a Chinese wine grower. Although the case appears straightforward, Gendarme captain Claire soon uncovers a complicated web of xenophobia, family troubles and dirty small-town politics.

programme.title: Victim
programme.desc: Ukrainian immigrant Irina lives with her son Igor in a small Czech border town. When she discovers that Igor has been assaulted by three Romas her whole world comes crashing down. As times goes on, Irina begins to spot inconsistencies in his story.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Milk Teeth
programme.desc: Living in a small rural community, Skalde navigates societal stigma due to having an “outsider” mother. When she befriends a mysterious girl in the woods, Skalde jeopardizes everything, struggling to balance loyalty to her community and her newfound bond.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Tuesday Club (OTO)
programme.desc: Karin's world crumbles on her 40th anniversary when she discovers her husband’s infidelity. Seeking solace in a cooking class with renowned chef Henrik, she rediscovers her lifelong passions and learns that it is never too late to follow her dreams.

programme.title: We Look The Same
programme.desc: In this witty short about racial and culture crises, a French-born Chinese store assistant is faced with a conundrum. A Chinese tourist needs to use the store’s restroom but that’s against the rules. Is compassion worth the risk of losing one’s job?

programme.title: Take It Or Leave it
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Complicity
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life incident. Cheng Liang, a Chinese illegal immigrant in Japan finds new direction when he fakes his identity and lands an apprenticeship with a master soba chef. However, the threat of deportation always lurks around the corner.
